bibl.title: Documents of Ancient Greek Music. The Extant Melodies and Fragments.
bibl.note: I. Fragments from the Classical Period (Nos 1-4). - II. Fragments from the late Classical to early Hellenistic Periods (Nos 5-19). - III. Late Hellenistic Inscriptions from Sanctuaries (Nos 20-22). - IV. Fragments from the Roman Period (Nos 23-61). - Abbreviations. Bibliography. Indexes.
bibl.seg: PÖHLMANN Egert and Martin L. WEST (Edited and Transcribed with Commentary by), Documents of Ancient Greek Music. The Extant Melodies and Fragments.
Oxford, Clarendon Press, 2001, 4°, 222 pp., portées, 1 front. coul., 18 figg., 10 pll. ISBN 0-19-815223-X. £40.

I. Fragments from the Classical Period (Nos 1-4). - II. Fragments from the late Classical to early Hellenistic Periods (Nos 5-19). - III. Late Hellenistic Inscriptions from Sanctuaries (Nos 20-22). - IV. Fragments from the Roman Period (Nos 23-61). - Abbreviations. Bibliography. Indexes.

C.R. par Pietro Giannini, Athenaeum 92 (2004) pp. 283-291. - Eleonora Rocconi, CR N.S., 53 (2003) pp. 69-71. - Werner Schubert, MusHelv 60 (2003) p. 263. - Bas van Bommel, Mnemosyne 4a s., 56 (2003) pp. 747-750. - François Duysinx, AntCl 73 (2004) pp. 471-472. - Bernhard Zimmermann, Gnomon 78 (2006) pp. 257-258.
